nexoclom2.atomicdata.lossrate
=============================

.. py:module:: nexoclom2.atomicdata.lossrate


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   nexoclom2.atomicdata.lossrate.lossrate


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: lossrate(packets, output)

   
   Calculate the loss rates due to photons, electron impacts, and charge-exchange
   with optional constant loss rate.


   :Parameters:

       **packets: nexoclom2 Packets object**
           ..

       **output: nexoclom2 Output object**
           ..



   :Returns:

       Ionization rate
           ..







   .. seealso::


       :obj:`nexoclom2.particle_tracking.packets.Packets`
           ..
       :obj:`nexoclom2.particle_tracking.Output.Output`
           ..

   .. rubric:: Notes

   Charge exchange is not included yet.



   ..
       !! processed by numpydoc !!
